BT Barber

Few minute walk from Walthamstow Central Station, BT Barber is on busy the Hoe street, has become recognised salon in North London. Our mission is to uphold quality care for each clients needs and provide an excellent customer service. We have talented barbers and stylists with skills and experience to cut all types of afro and European hair textures.   We have relaxing and friendly environment for our customers. Our trusted, fast growing customer base often return for their professional service that suits their personality and style.
